Class RandomAccessFilePool

java.lang.Object
org.apache.commons.pool2.BaseObject
org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.BaseGenericObjectPool<T>
org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPool<File,RandomAccessFileWrapper>
com.storage.engine.file_access.RandomAccessFilePool
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPoolMXBean<File>, org.apache.commons.pool2.KeyedObjectPool<File,RandomAccessFileWrapper>
public class RandomAccessFilePool extends org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPool<File,RandomAccessFileWrapper>
A pool implementation for managing instances of RandomAccessFileWrapper. Extends GenericKeyedObjectPool.

    • borrowObject

      public RandomAccessFileWrapper borrowObject(File key)
      Borrow an instance of RandomAccessFileWrapper associated with the specified key (file).
      Specified by:
      borrowObject in interface org.apache.commons.pool2.KeyedObjectPool<File,RandomAccessFileWrapper>
      Overrides:
      borrowObject in class org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericKeyedObjectPool<File,RandomAccessFileWrapper>
      Parameters:
      key - The key (file) associated with the RandomAccessFileWrapper.
      Returns:
      The borrowed RandomAccessFileWrapper instance.
      Throws:
      StorageDBRuntimeException - If an exception occurs while borrowing the object.
